title: People, Shall We?
body:
Choice ONE:
Humanity Priority 
 - Love leads the way

Why
Survival is the No. 1 priority
To ensure survival, continued existence and passing down of the genetic and legacy of life, intelligence and love.

What
To become the next tier of intelligence through learning how to work together as one with the help of science and technology, to ensure the survival of humanity as a whole.


How
A DAO to protect existing existence 
ESG
Learn to love and share
Save earth 
Eliminate all view of differences within humanity
Eliminate war
Eliminate poverty 
Eliminate all discrimination 
Eliminate greed
Ensure education, research and development, creations of generational growth and advancement. 
UBI 
Utilize and create technology to learn Working as one (think bees and ants except we make our own nerves communication system through blockchain, metaverse etc) 
Provide others with Love

Multi TimexSpace Species 
Biological longevity 
Social longevity
Information longevity 
Technology longevity 


Everyone can edit this document, let's just start the planning for the people! Let's start adding categories, adding subcategories, topics, ideas, plans, and let's spend the rest of our generation to set the foundation for the future. 
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1776lbmEARURjWRFordZcgZXZNxA4l4mimY62DTDE_h0/edit?usp=sharing



Choice TWO: $people can go to the moon, the people are still heading to self destruction faster than ever, and no body's excused.
author: 0xC2685cE5228a07fbF909B945986D189e52425455
